function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased public awareness of wildlife protection through social media","Impact":"Potential for misinformation to spread rapidly","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns to promote accurate information","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and fact-checking tools","People":"General public, wildlife organizations","Owner":"Government, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Two-way dialogue between stakeholders enabled by social media","Impact":"Risk of disinformation and manipulation of public opinion","Mitigation":"Promote critical thinking and digital literacy, fact-checking initiatives","Technologies":"Blockchain for data verification, AI for fake news detection","People":"General public, decision-makers","Owner":"Social media platforms, government, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Increased use of social media for politics and decision-making","Impact":"Potential for the spread of biased information and propaganda","Mitigation":"Transparency in political communication, fact-based reporting","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent information sharing, AI for identifying propaganda","People":"Citizens, decision-makers","Owner":"Government, media organizations"}]}
